ai-thig3.3:1.2_0: for realizing the path that leads to extinguishment.
ai-thig3.3:1.4_0: as it was taught by the Buddha:
ai-thig3.3:2.1_0: I attain the meditations on emptiness
ai-thig3.3:2.3_0: I am the Buddha’s rightful daughter,
ai-thig3.3:3.1_0: All sensual pleasures are cut off,
ai-thig3.3:3.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
ai-thig3.3:4.1_0: Another senior monk, who were senior,
